mapper.select:
select distinct m.fid as id, m.fname_l2 as title , m.fnumber as num,m.FOLDNUMBER as longNumber, m.FTAXREGISTERNO as taxNum,m.FMnemonicCode as memNumber,m.FIsInternalCompany isInner, ba.FBANKACCOUNT as bankAccount,ba.FBANK as bank from T_BD_Supplier m left join T_BD_SUPPLIERCOMPANYINFO ci on ci.FSUPPLIERID=m.FID left join T_BD_SUPPLIERCOMPANYBANK ba on ba.FSUPPLIERCOMPANYINFOID=ci.fid
m.FUsedStatus=1
and m.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
order by m.fnumber
